Articles.Content: ![xB3zgx.jpg](http://imageshack.com/a/img633/5101/xB3zgx.jpg) **Chaka Monkey Exploration Systems 1.1.3** **[Chaka Monkey 1.1.3 Dropbox Link](https://www.dropbox.com/s/ismzivygdtgiuhe/CHAKA%20113%20DB.zip?dl=0)** **[Chaka Monkey 1.1.3 Spacedock Link](http://spacedock.info/mod/599/Chaka%20Monkey%20Exploration%20Systems/download/Chaka_Monkey_Exploration_Systems_1.1.3)** **[Chaka Monkey 1.1.3 CF Link](https://kerbal.curseforge.com/projects/chaka-monkey-exploration-systems/files/2321567/download)** **[Click here to "Get Monkey"](https://youtu.be/k5M9N8ibvlQ)** ![0iBJRy.jpg](http://imageshack.com/a/img923/5631/0iBJRy.jpg) ![G4bVK6.jpg](http://imageshack.com/a/img922/41/G4bVK6.jpg) ![Ls4zcA.jpg](http://imageshack.com/a/img922/5503/Ls4zcA.jpg) ![Y72cKG.jpg](http://imageshack.com/a/img921/3245/Y72cKG.jpg) ![irToQw.jpg](http://imageshack.com/a/img921/783/irToQw.jpg) ![GEi5qK.jpg](http://imageshack.com/a/img922/5083/GEi5qK.jpg) ![PjDAMl.jpg](http://imageshack.com/a/img924/7127/PjDAMl.jpg) ![Vw2Ujj.jpg](http://imageshack.com/a/img923/6997/Vw2Ujj.jpg) ![sixYQl.jpg](http://imageshack.com/a/img922/7177/sixYQl.jpg) ![Z0W3EJ.jpg](http://imageshack.com/a/img923/7995/Z0W3EJ.jpg) **Chaka Monkey Exploration Odyssey is a space program based on NASA and Boeing proposals for future missions. Part models from a wide variety of authors have been licensed, and new original models made, then combined with all new textures, sizes and configurations, to create craft files depicting the proposed missions. This project is modeled at 75% real scale.** **♦ Recommend installing this pack into a clean KSP install for the first time.** **♦ Latest version of Raster Prop Monitor needed for IVA function. Link included in download.** **♦ Copy everything in provided GameData to your GameData** **♦ Copy VAB folder to Ships** **♦ Copy Subassemblies to your save (optional)** **♦ Please remove any previous version files before installing!** ![qpnF63.jpg](http://imageshack.com/a/img921/380/qpnF63.jpg) **Chaka Monkey Exploration Systems includes products licensed from the following authors:** **Winston & Kickasskyle - KW Rocketry** [**https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/**](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/) **Alexustas - A.L.C.O.R. They worked very hard to make these parts and we have organized them for Monkey Exploration because they are excellent. Also Chaka wishes to thank our excellent beta test team: Voidryder, AJLSpace85, JoseEduardo, MeCripp, Probus, Drj3199 for putting in many hours of science which made the quality of this release possible.** ![qdWsO8.jpg](http://imageshack.com/a/img908/2193/qdWsO8.jpg) **Special technical services provided by MeCripp Industrial Coding, LLC** **Advanced habitat models provided by:** ![3295f01eca.jpg](https://i.imgsafe.org/3295f01eca.jpg) **Monkey Rover Wheels provided by:** **![joXUlV.jpg](http://imageshack.com/a/img908/3272/joXUlV.jpg)** **BMW, AG** **LICENSE** **Unless otherwise specified, all materials available for download on this page are copyrighted and released under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 License. I'M SO HAPPY!!!!
YAY!! Finally an update for one of my favorite mods!!!

Dear Esteemed Monkey Rocket Designers,

We, your humble colleagues at Void Aerospace enthusiastically salute your latest grand achievement with all honest sincerity.  It is remarkable engineering feat. 

As you are undoubtedly aware Void Aerospace had to cease all launch operations due to pesky inquiry from Central Committee based upon unfounded

accusations of safety violations from handful of surviving staff and/or their widows.

However with clever name change, we expect to resume all space exploration activities using Monkey's outstanding launch vehicles, command modules and landers

as soon as paint dry on new sign.

Best Wishes Always,

The Grand Designer

Void Aerospace Inc

P.S. See new name? Lawyers say adding Inc means all new company. Did not explain what Inc means though. Happy launching!

Mk1-2 Pod IVA Replacement by ASET wants to be updated in <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">CKAN</abbr>, citing "Chaka Monkey Exploration System" as the mod version. Not sure what this is all about but I don't trust it until I see some documentation or more info.

> 
> 
> On 8/8/2016 at 1:30 PM, Tossy64 said:
> 
> 
> Mk1-2 Pod IVA Replacement by ASET wants to be updated in <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)"><abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)"><abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)"><abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">CKAN</abbr></abbr></abbr></abbr>, citing "Chaka Monkey Exploration System" as the mod version. Not sure what this is all about but I don't trust it until I see some documentation or more info.
> 

Sure. 

Nice as it is, the venerable 1-2 Pod IVA replacement has not been recently updated. You gotta give Alex some IRL time before he swings back around to that. There shouldn't be any real issues other than that particular <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)"><abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)"><abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">CKAN</abbr></abbr></abbr> message.

<iframe data-embedcontent="" frameborder="0" src="https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/116440-iva104-mk1-2-pod-iva-replacement-by-aset-wip/&do=embed&page=6"></iframe>

We are extremely pleased with the quality of ASET products and our partnership with their development team. Chaka will continue to support our license agreement and use that IVA group even if they are not updated soon.

quick question: Does this support R.O or vice versa?

> quick question: Does this support R.O or vice versa?

Sometimes. **We will not explicitly support R.O.** because keeping the pack running in stock KSP is complicated enough. However, from time to time various brave developers have taken it upon themselves to provide support. Indeed, even more brave developers have created new products dependant on those brave endeavours. 

Best luck!

We don't keep close tabs on which developers are volunteering their time to work on Chaka in <abbr title="Realism Overhaul (mod)">RO</abbr> / <abbr title="Real Solar System (mod)">RSS</abbr> at any given time and since we just released the update this week I didn't want to put work on their desk before they have time to get to it on their own. Typically the <abbr title="Real Solar System (mod)">RSS</abbr> port is in perpetual WIP status.

[https://github.com/KSP-<abbr title="Realism Overhaul (mod)">RO</abbr>/RealismOverhaul/blob/master/GameData/RealismOverhaul/RO_Readme.txt](https://github.com/KSP-RO/RealismOverhaul/blob/master/GameData/RealismOverhaul/RO_Readme.txt)

[@YANFRET](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/90547-yanfret/), awesome work as usual!
Is there going to be RealPlume support?

[@LordOfMinecraft99](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/159942-lordofminecraft99/) [@Larste](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/167387-larste/) <abbr title="Realism Overhaul (mod)">RO</abbr> support will come but due to the size and scope of the mod it will take a while. Please be patient.

**Question for users:**

We are planning a major update to Chaka that will greatly influence pack size and game play. Specifically, the pack will be split into two parts, based on the medium and heavy launch vehicles. Also, widespread simplification of lander technologies will result in reduced overall combined size on disk. 

**While this work is completed, please reply here with your wish list of changes to the pack.** 

Although we cannot guarantee requests will be granted, it would be helpful to have feedback at this time.
